殉.definition: to be buried with the dead; to die for a cause

殉情.definition: to die together in the name of love; to sacrifice oneself for love

殉死.definition: to be buried alive as sacrifice (together with husband or superior)

殉節.definition: to sacrifice one's life by loyalty (to one's prince, one's husband etc)

殉職.definition: to die in the line of duty

殉葬.definition: (of servants etc) to be buried alive with the deceased; (of utensils etc) to be buried with the dead

殉道.definition: to die for a just cause

殉難.definition: to sacrifice oneself in a just cause; a victim of a disaster
